name: 3eltr4i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c2, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c2, c1)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c2, c1)
-| wcel(c2, c3)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wcel(c2, c3)
-| wceq(c1, c3)

comment: Substitution of equal classes into membership relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
